Templates¶

Overview¶

To test the functionalities of each tool, there are multiple templates avaliable to use them.

Mrs_spec_chan templates¶

The templates for this tool can be downloaded from this first link.

Mrs_det_plot templates¶

The templates for this tool can be downloaded from this second link.

Fit_line templates¶

The templates for this tool can be downloaded from this third link.
